parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: The Person, Location/HealthcareService or Device that this appointment response replies for

parameters.name: appointment
parameters.description: The appointment that the response is attached to

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: An Identifier in this appointment response

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: This Response is for this Location

parameters.name: part-status
parameters.description: The participants acceptance status for this appointment

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: This Response is for this Patient

parameters.name: practitioner
parameters.description: This Response is for this Practitioner
